name: Lupi Lumen in: Separated
description:
This game is the first game to be released in the Separated series. Lupi Lumen is an Action-Adventure Collect-a-thon Game where the goal is to collect items all around the different worlds to unlock new worlds.

The battle system is based around magic, but the basic attack is using the D-pad to dash through enemies. You can unlock magic spells according to color based on the boss you defeat.

The main goal of the game is to collect 42 Essence Gems (6 per world) to unlock the gate to the final boss.

Pause to see controls.

My plans for this game is to play test and bug fix, as well as put together the cutscenes for the finished Alpha version that I will put on Steam. No bug reports are necessary but appreciated.
